verses.verse: To the chief <S%H5329>Musician,<s%> A <S%H4210>Psalm<s%> for the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7141>Korah.<s%> <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> thou hast been <S%H7521>favorable<s%> unto thy <S%H776>land:<s%> thou hast brought <S%H7725>back<s%> the <S%H7622>captivity<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob.<s%>
Thou hast <S%H5375>forgiven<s%> the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of thy <S%H5971>people,<s%> thou hast <S%H3680>covered<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H2403>sin.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>
Thou hast taken <S%H622>away<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> thy <S%H5678>wrath:<s%> thou hast <S%H7725>turned<s%> thyself from the <S%H4480>fierceness<s%> <S%H2740><s%> of thine <S%H639>anger.<s%>
Turn <S%H7725><s%> us, O <S%H430>God<s%> of our <S%H3468>salvation,<s%> and cause thine <S%H3708>anger<s%> <S%H5973>toward<s%> us to <S%H6565>cease.<s%>
Wilt thou be <S%H599>angry<s%> with us <S%H5769>forever?<s%> wilt thou draw <S%H4900>out<s%> thine <S%H639>anger<s%> to all <S%H1755>generations?<s%> <S%H1755><s%>
Wilt <S%H859>thou<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H2421>revive<s%> us <S%H7725>again:<s%> that thy <S%H5971>people<s%> may <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> in thee?
Show <S%H7200><s%> us thy <S%H2617>mercy,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H5414>grant<s%> us thy <S%H3468>salvation.<s%>

I will <S%H8085>hear<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> <S%H410>God<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will <S%H1696>speak:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> he will <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H7965>peace<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> his <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H413>to<s%> his <S%H2623>saints:<s%> but let them <S%H408>not<s%> turn <S%H7725>again<s%> to <S%H3690>folly.<s%>
Surely <S%H389><s%> his <S%H3468>salvation<s%> is <S%H7138>nigh<s%> them that <S%H3373>fear<s%> him; that <S%H3519>glory<s%> may <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in our <S%H776>land.<s%>
Mercy <S%H2617><s%> and <S%H571>truth<s%> are met <S%H6298>together;<s%> <S%H6664>righteousness<s%> and <S%H7965>peace<s%> have <S%H5401>kissed<s%> each other.
Truth <S%H571><s%> shall <S%H6779>spring<s%> out of the <S%H4480>earth;<s%> <S%H776><s%> and <S%H6664>righteousness<s%> shall look <S%H8259>down<s%> from <S%H4480>heaven.<s%> <S%H8064><s%>
Yea, <S%H1571><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H5414>give<s%> that which is <S%H2896>good;<s%> and our <S%H776>land<s%> shall <S%H5414>yield<s%> her <S%H2981>increase.<s%>
Righteousness <S%H6664><s%> shall <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him; and shall <S%H7760>set<s%> us in the <S%H1870>way<s%> of his <S%H6471>steps.<s%>
